name: Ravencoin
introduce:
Ravencoin is a peer-to-peer blockchain, handling the efficient creation and transfer of assets from one party to another. The protocol is designed to facilitate the creation and transfer of tokens that represent real-world assets such as securities, collectibles, gold, event tickets or even airline miles.
Built on a fork of the Bitcoin code, Ravencoin was launched January 3rd, 2018, and is aopen source project (no ICO or masternodes).
